alert.note: Alert for Judith Gap; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 20 at 2:44PM MST until December 21 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blowing and drifting snow expected this evening into the overnight. Winds gusting as high as 45 to 50 mph. * WHERE...Judith Gap, Northern Sweet Grass, Melville Foothills and Southern Wheatland. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility to below a mile at times and produce locally slick road conditions. Strong wind gusts will make travel difficult, especially for high profile vehicles and those towing trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A cold front will bring light snow to the area late tonight. Snow accumulations up to 2 inches are possible, highest near Judith Gap.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at http://www.weather.gov/billings

area.areaDesc: Judith Gap; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland
